verses.verse: Maschil of David, when he was in the cave; a Prayer. I <S%H6963>cry<s%> with my <S%H6963>voice<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; With my <S%H6963>voice<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> do I make <S%H2603>supplication<s%>.
I pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H7879>complaint<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5046>him<s%>; I show <S%H6440>before<s%> him my <S%H6869>trouble<s%>.

When my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was <S%H5848>overwhelmed<s%> within <S%H3045>me<s%>, Thou knewest my <S%H5410>path<s%>. In the <S%H734>way<s%> <S%H2098>wherein<s%> I <S%H1980>walk<s%> Have they <S%H2934>hidden<s%> a snare for <S%H6341>me<s%>.

Look <S%H5027><s%> on my right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%>; For there is no man that <S%H5234>knoweth<s%> <S%H4498>me<s%>: Refuge hath <S%H6>failed<s%> <S%H1875>me<s%>; No man careth for my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
I <S%H2199>cried<s%> unto <S%H3068>thee<s%>, O Jehovah; I <S%H559>said<s%>, Thou art my <S%H4268>refuge<s%>, My <S%H2506>portion<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>.

Attend <S%H7181><s%> unto my <S%H7440>cry<s%>; For I am <S%H1809>brought<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1809>low<s%>: <S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me from my <S%H7291>persecutors<s%>; For they are stronger than <S%H553>I<s%>.

Bring <S%H3318><s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> out of <S%H4525>prison<s%>, That I may give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto thy <S%H8034>name<s%>: The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall compass me <S%H3803>about<s%>; For thou wilt deal bountifully with <S%H1580>me<s%>.
